headline: Goldman Sachs Begins Coverage on Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock With Buy Rating
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the Most Promising AI Stocks to Buy Now. Goldman Sachs initiated coverage on the company’s stock with a “Buy” rating and a price objective of $225.00. As per the firm, Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) remains well-positioned to benefit from the semiconductor industry’s ongoing pivot towards 3D architectures, which need more […]
